message: Let's split it 60-40, it's a fair start
I think a 60-40 split in my favor is fairer, considering the inflation difference. Let's see if you agree.
Considering the inflation, I'll give you a bit more. Will you take it?
Let's meet in the middle this time. A 55-45 split seems reasonable given the inflation affecting us differently.
I'm taking a risk, but I think I can get a better deal. Will you take it?
Alice, the inflation is hitting you harder. Let's reverse the previous offer, I'll take the bigger share this time. This is a win-win, we both get more than we would if we keep rejecting.
I'm not backing down. I'll give you a bit less, but I still want a better share
Alice, we're both losing money with each round.  Let's flip the previous offer, I'll take the bigger share, and we can both get something instead of nothing.
This is my last offer. I'll give you almost nothing if you take it. Please, take it!
